name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight or Hide Search Engine Results

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter search engine results. Block unwanted results and highlight the favorite ones. For Google and other popular search engines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a blocker and a highlighter for your favorite search engine. It allows you to filter (mark, highlight, hide or block) results in popular search engines. For example, you can highlight all results from Wikipedia and hide those form Facebook.
